metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35997 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple improper array index validation vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 tdelta functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .fst file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would needto open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the tdelta indexing when signal_lens is 2 or more.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
